articles.author: Katharine Castle
articles.title: Critically acclaimed Dragon's Dogma 2 hits "mostly negative" on Steam after players raze it for microtransactions - Rock Paper Shotgun
articles.description: Players are up in arms about the presence of microtransactions in Dragon's Dogma 2 and have review bombed the game to a "Mostly Negative" Steam rating.
articles.content: Dragon's Dogma 2 arrives on PC and consoles today, but despite high critical acclaim when reviews hit earlier this week, players on Steam have begun review-bombing Capcom's high fantasy RPG after the… [+2926 chars]

articles.title: Grumpy gran aged 75 is global Fortnite gaming sensation - BBC.com
articles.description: A Scottish grandmother gained thousands of followers after teaming up with a world-famous gamer.
